reviews.review:
if you play cs:go, then play it if you want
if you dont play cs:go, then dont even start 
why?

you'll waste money on skins and cases, you'll gamble on cases and always get bad stuff, you'll probably break some of your stuff on your table, you'll probably have to go to the hospital for ear surgery because of someone's mic in the voicechat, you'll probably have to go to the hospital for hand surgery because you broke it from the rage, you'll probably run into a cheater on the enemy team, you'll have to waste money for less cheaters (prime), you'll probably be kicked off of competitive because of some toxic guy who has the least kills of the server, you'll be trolled by cs:go hitboxes, and much more

overall 
great game 10/10
Just installed... game crashing on Initializing world .... pathetic
